detail_desc: Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a flounced trim, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, ribbed stand-up collar, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the cardigan is organic.
High-waisted, 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Fitted top in jersey with wide shoulder straps and a knot detail at the top.

Fitted, single-breasted jacket in a crêpe weave with a satin shawl collar, chest pocket and jetted front pockets. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Small, round shoulder bag in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a glittery heart on the front, a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 4x13 cm.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Scarf in a soft loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Dress in plumeti viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length, flared sleeves.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved body in stretch velour with a V-neck and small stand-up collar with two pairs of hooks and eyes at the back of the neck. Opening at the back and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow tie and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Sewn-on waistcoat in woven fabric with a decorative chest pocket and buttons down the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
One-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a shoulder strap on one side and a long sleeve on the other.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood in jersey, a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Decorative fabric appliqués, flap chest pockets with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short, oversized T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with a print motif with embroidery on the front, large patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist and concealed zip. Unlined.
Blouse in a transparent weave with an embroidered floral pattern. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.

Ankle-length chinos in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a detachable braided imitation leather belt.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with raw edges and a raw-edge hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Suede loafers with a decorative strap and seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with gentle gathers and buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups with raw-edge, cut-off hems.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed neckline. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey.
Plastic water bottle with a non-drip lid with appliqués and a straw. Detachable, adjustable fabric strap. Capacity 450 ml.
Lightly padded jacket in washed cotton denim with a faux shearling collar and soft flannel lining. Buttons down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and button, and buttoned cuffs.
Short, fitted dungaree dress in washed denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons down the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Slip-on trainers in woven fabric with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a terry appliqué on the front and rib trim around the neckline.
All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and chest pocket. Raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless playsuit in jersey crêpe with a wrapover skirt layered over the top. Lined front with gathers at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and ties at one side.
Long-sleeved top in soft, airy slub jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.

Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a textured premium cotton weave with a cutaway collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Round sunglasses with narrow metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon. Deep V-neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and a yoke with elastication and gathers at the top and at the back. Long dolman sleeves and an asymmetric seam with a drawstring at the waist. Flared skirt with a high slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Short-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short dress in woven fabric with a wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Fully lined joggers in woven fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Jersey lining.
Treggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long dress in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Underdress in woven fabric.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle top and bottom and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, one outer compartment with a zip and one zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate. Lined. Size 14x29.5x45.5 cm.
Imitation suede mules with open toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Henley shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small collar in a contrasting colour and button placket. Long sleeves with elbow patches, a small chest pocket and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (7.5-11.5) and one pair in a child size.
Rib-knit hat in soft cashmere.
Calf-length skirt in pleated satin with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with tassels at the ends. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, patterned satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with ties at the front. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a skirt with a slit in one side. Partly lined.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.
